questions.question: How many fingers do you have on one hand?
Which letter comes first in Urdu alphabet?
Urdu is written from right to left
How many letters are in Urdu alphabet?
Who wrote 'Lab pe aati hai dua'?

observations.subject: Mathematics
observations.preObservationNotes: Observing lesson on basic addition with visual aids
observations.feedback: Excellent use of interactive teaching methods. Students were engaged throughout the lesson.

observations.subject: English
observations.preObservationNotes: First observation for the academic year - focusing on reading comprehension strategies
observations.feedback: Good foundation in teaching methodology. Room for improvement in student differentiation.
recommendations: Increase wait time for student responses
Use more visual aids for vocabulary

indicators.name: Student Engagement
indicators.notes: Some students appeared disengaged during reading

indicators.name: Instructional Clarity
indicators.notes: Instructions were clear but could be more concise

indicators.name: Classroom Management
indicators.notes: Good overall but transitions could be smoother

observations.subject: Urdu
observations.preObservationNotes: Observing letter recognition lesson with Grade 1 students
observations.feedback: Outstanding lesson delivery. Teacher shows exceptional skill in early childhood education methods.

indicators.name: Student Engagement
indicators.notes: All students fully engaged through songs and activities

observations.subject: Mathematics
observations.preObservationNotes: End of unit assessment observation - subtraction concepts
observations.feedback: Solid teaching performance with good use of manipulatives. Student progress evident.
recommendations: Develop extension activities for advanced students

indicators.name: Assessment Integration
indicators.notes: Good use of informal assessment throughout

indicators.name: Differentiation
indicators.notes: Some differentiation but could be more targeted

observations.subject: English
observations.preObservationNotes: Grammar lesson focusing on nouns and verbs
observations.feedback: Excellent lesson structure with creative activities. Students demonstrated strong understanding.

observations.subject: Urdu
observations.preObservationNotes: Poetry appreciation lesson - Allama Iqbal's works
observations.feedback: Engaging lesson with good cultural connections. Students showed appreciation for poetry.

indicators.name: Content Knowledge
indicators.notes: Teacher demonstrated deep knowledge of poetry

indicators.name: Cultural Connections
indicators.notes: Good connections to Pakistani history and culture
